event_date.label: Event Date
event_date.instructions: Date of event or start date of event.

event_time.label: Event Time
event_time.instructions: Enter this if it's a single day event only.

event_enddate.label: Event End Date
event_enddate.instructions: Fill this only if it's a multiday event. For single day events, don't fill this.

event_thumb_image.label: Event Thumbnail
event_thumb_image.instructions: This will be displayed on Events lisitng page.

event_large_image.label: Event Image
event_large_image.instructions: This is for Event details page.
